item.title: Avengers: Endgame
item.description: The plot of the movie "Avengers: Endgame" tells about the events after Thanos was able to carry out his plan. Half Vmelennoj evaporate and now nobody knows what will happen next. Naturally the situation is not the best way, and many have lost their loved ones. Stark is committed in another world and no one knows if he is alive. The same is happening on the ground is a real mess. Many people do not believe that someday will be able to fix something, but do it. The Avengers lost their war and it seems that there is no way out of the situation. But give up they are just not going. Will have to challenge the mad Titan and try to win this time. To do so would be extremely difficult and complicated, but it is to rely on the positive result. Only by bringing all his forces together, they will be able to strike, which would probably fix this whole situation. Ahead of their final battle, in which each character would try to participate. What this all will end and whether they will oppose such a strong enemy? Once failed, so it is not known why this all will lead! War is only just beginning and is nearing the most finals, which will put an end to this confrontation.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
item.description: After the event, bringing together a team of Avengers, Captain America decides to stay in Washington. He has tried its best to adapt to the modern world, which has changed a lot over that time, while Steve was frozen. But the quiet life he had dreamed about, and soon he finds himself in the center of events that could lead to global catastrophe. Realizing that stop villains alone would be very uneasy, Captain America joins forces with the black widow, and later joins them and another hero, known to all as the Falcon. However, none of their teams cannot even imagine, what a terrible force has their new enemy.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
item.description: While still a child, the protagonist Peter Quill becomes a victim of kidnapping by extraterrestrials. As an adult, he takes the nickname Star Lord and turns into one of the most legendary bandits throughout the Galaxy, but, at least, he thinks so. Once Peter in SED mysterious and very powerful artifact, owned by the powerful and knowledgeable not pity villain Ronan, who yearns to capture the universe. However, there are still others who wants the artifact, resulting in Peter turns out to be a victim of intergalactic hunting. Ahead of his many breathtaking adventure, meeting new friends, with whom they have to work together to save the Galaxy.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
item.description: Four years have passed since the last events. Then during clashes between Autobots and Decepticons enormous Chicago was virtually fully destroyed, and millions of people died. After this incident, humanity has radically changed its attitude to all transformers without exception. People have learned a good lesson from all that has happened, and to prevent this from happening again, a group of scientists and businessmen manage to reach a completely new technological level.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: As the Gods Will
item.description: The action of the action-movie "As the Gods Will" takes place in our days in Japan. A teenager named sun Takahata is studying in high school, and unlike his peers, he is not quite happy with his life, because it seems to him boring and monotonous. The guy dreams that something extraordinary and memorable happened. And once the desire Suna implemented, but not as he had imagined. The school begins to appear strange live toys that offer students to play a variety of games. At first glance, everything looks harmless, but in reality it is not so simple. Toys, which is headed by the ancient God the Dolls are actually do not leave children, since those who refused to play, the result will meet the same fate as the loser certain death. Those who still manage to win, will be given life. Here is only will whether such?
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
item.description: Fantastic action movie directed by Joe Johnston, which formed the plot of the same name comics publisher "Marvel Comics". The action takes place in the midst of the Second World war. The hero of the film Steve Rogers very much wants to get into the army, but due to the fact that the guy is very thin and looks sick, it does not take. But one day his wish in some measure come to pass, and he becomes a party to the selection, for a place in a secret military experiment, in which with the help of a special serum and radiation Guinea pig needs to turn into a super soldier. Thanks to their dedication and courage Steve is the selection and turn it into a real fighting machine. The guy begins to perform various dangerous tasks for his country under the pseudonym "Captain America". However, ahead of him waiting for the confrontation with a very strong and dangerous enemy, eager to take over the world.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Interstellar
item.description: The movie "Interstellar" occurs in the near future. The climate on Earth has changed significantly, and the high concentration of nitrogen will soon lead to loss of life. There is an urgent need to look for another planet to move on it the entire human race. Scientists have discovered a wormhole in space through which you can move to another Galaxy. This is the only way for the salvation of all mankind.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: The Avengers
item.description: On the ground gets an extraterrestrial source of inexhaustible energy Tesserkat. A team of scientists exploring the unknown material takes S.h.i.e.l.d. into their own hands. After the study, astrophysicist Eric Selvig informs the Director of Fury that the tesseract is not stable, and could happen at any time such a powerful burst of energy that all living creatures will disappear from the face of the Earth. When the cube is activated, it opens the gates between the worlds, through which the Earth gets adopted son Loki god Odin. He picks up Tesserkat, and Eric Selviga and Clint Barton, nicknamed "Hawkeye". Agents are sent followed by Loki, because their mind is subject to his will through the magical skipetru. Referring to the looming threat of Fury decides to revive the Avengers initiative project, previously canceled for unexplained reasons.
item.dc:creator: Admin

item.title: Bermuda Tentacles
item.description: American Fantasy horror film (Bermuda Tentacles) can find a response in the soul of even the most sophisticated cinephile. The action unfolds on kinoistorii sea Bermuda triangle. Peaceful ship quietly goes to the coveted military objective-to shore. But it is precisely at the moment of calm and serenity in the way the vessel is raised sea monster is bulky, the stench of foul, heartbreaking. And then ship the AIR FORCE will have to maintain an unequal battle with the sea giant. All possible forces and guns. Bermuda tentacles leave no choice: fight or die.

item.title: Hellboy
item.description: Powerful and insane Nimue, enlightening centuries later, intends to arrange the Apocalypse and plunge mankind into chaos. The hero of the movie to fight the hordes of evil, which called itself the Queen for help. Sometimes it seems that the guy can't do this an impossible mission. The girl turns out to be the wife of the great Wizard Merlin. Of course, fight alone with this enemy cannot and battle with evil our Sapphire will assist a team of people, each of whom is a professional.
